thread.title: BBT Forum Dublin: Limited free spaces for buyers | Buying Business Travel
thread.title_full: BBT Forum Dublin: Limited free spaces for buyers | Buying Business Travel

title: BBT Forum Dublin: Limited free spaces for buyers | Buying Business Travel
text:
0 comments BBT Thu, 10 Sep 2015 13:03 Follow @BBT_online Complimentary tickets are still available to travel buyers for Buying Business Travel’s Dublin forum later this month.
The event, supported by ACTE , will be held at The Gibson Hotel Dublin, on September 22.
The BBT Forums are an open platform for travel buyers offering an excellent opportunity for dialogue and debate on key issues with peers and industry experts.
This event will explore how buyers can optimise your risk strategy in a changing environment.
BBT editor Paul Revel said: “Our forums are a great way for travel buyers to get together and talk about subjects of mutual interest and concern. They're also excellent for dialogue between buyers and suppliers on the most important topics affecting business travel.”
To book your place go to our dedicated forum website.
If you are a travel manager or buyer and do not have the budget to attend please contact Claire Robson at crobson@panaceapublishing.com or call +44 (0) 207 821 2700 and we will try and match you with a complimentary sponsor-hosted place.
